communications.communication:
Dear Public Records Officer,

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Act, La. R.S. 44:1 et seq., I am writing to request access to and copies of the records pertaining to my great uncle, Delano Ray Maret, who was arrested in November 1965 and sentenced to three years in the Louisiana State Penitentiary in December 1965. Below are the details to help locate the records:

- Full Name: Delano Ray Maret
- Date of Birth: February 22, 1946
- Date of Arrest: November 1965
- Date of Sentencing: December 1965

I am seeking all records related to his incarceration at the Louisiana State Penitentiary, including but not limited to arrest records, sentencing records, incarceration records, and release records.

If there are any fees for searching or copying these records, please inform me of the cost before proceeding with my request. If you need any further information or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

In accordance with the Louisiana Public Records Act, I would appreciate a response within the statutory period. Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Sincerely,

Jonah Specht
